name: Lucky Prime
overview:
Lucky Prime offers hosted software solutions to higher education institutions and associations. They understand the budgetary constraints of higher education and aim to create affordable software solutions.

Currently, Lucky Prime offers two products: TutorLP and MemberLP. TutorLP, their flagship product, is a scheduling and management tool for academic centers. At it’s core, TutorLP can be to used to schedule tutoring sessions, track learning center usage, and produce dynamic reports. Their second product, MemberLP, is a membership management tool which tracks members (both people and organizations), organize contacts, create electronic invoices, and keep a historical record of membership/payment information.

Lucky Prime was founded in July 2009 and operates outside of Baltimore, MD.
